promoherobanner.description: Fuel for your next getaway {{DELTAMILES}} BONUS MILES for enrolling + earn miles for every dollar you spend on your gas bill.

promotioncontent.description:
Get {{DELTAMILES}} Bonus Miles for signing up on an ONG fixed price plan.

Select your utility to start earning miles:
promotioncontent.fineprinttext: * Offers are available only for new residential customers, who use 6,000 Ccf per year or less, using applicable promotion code. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Energy Choice program. ONG prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.888.466.4427, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com. Early termination charges will apply for residential fixed price plans (12-month plan: $150/$75, Winter Fixed / 6-month plan: $75). Cannot be combined with any other offer. Cannot be combined with any other offer.
promotioncontent.heading: Choose from one of our plans to get started right away!
promotioncontent.text:
Earn TWO miles for every dollar spent on your ONG supplier natural gas charges.*

Don’t wait too long. Offer ends {{EXPIRATIONDATE}}

And, if you are a SkyMiles Medallion® member, earn an additional mile for a total of THREE miles for each eligible dollar spent.

Easy Sign Up

Switching is easy! One call to us and we will handle all the details.

  • There will be no service interruption.
  • Our experts ensure a seamless transition. Your provider will continue to deliver your gas, send you one monthly bill and respond to service calls.
  • Limited to qualified new customers.

For more program details, visit onlyong.com/skymiles

Frequently Asked Questions >

Delta Program Terms and Conditions > 

Join Delta Skymiles >
